text: That's later but first here's Anna facing an exciting challenge up north
What were you expecting out of it
I get a bit of a buzz out of adrenaline
Our fearless guide and leader is Budda the man who knows everything about the river
It's a lot better than I thought it would be
Yeah, now what about you Tom how're you handling it
And I got to paddle a bit more up the front all the time because Anna won't come come to the party
And the man who cooked that remarkable meal is Mr Gerard Boyer
And once three little children came along there wasn't much chance to do it
I think my stop's coming up
